title: Business Analyst

sections.full_text:
Business Analyst
MapleTech Winnipeg, MB

Responsibilities:
- Gather and document requirements from stakeholders
- Create process maps and workflow diagrams
- Facilitate Scrum ceremonies
- Support QA with test case documentation
sections.skills:
- Requirements gathering, user story writing
- SQL and Excel
- Jira, Confluence

Preferred:
- Knowledge of Agile methodologies
